West Virginia safety Karl Joseph makes a tackle in last years game against Texas PERIOD



Ahead of his highly anticipated senior season West Virginia Mountaineers safety Karl Joseph was named to the Bednarik Award Watch List as announced by the Maxwell Football Club on Tuesday PERIOD

The hardhitting linchpin of the Mountaineer secondary Joseph heads a defensive backfield that could rank as one of the Big 12s best after turning in an acclaimed junior season that saw him earn AllBig  First Team honors PERIOD

 said Mountaineer defensive coordinator Tony Gibson in an interview with WVUSports.com PERIOD 

In  Joseph finished second on the team with  total tackles forcing a teamhigh three fumbles and recording one interception as West Virginia finished with a  record PERIOD

Joseph has consistently been one of West Virginias most productive defensive players since coming to Morgantown from Edgewater High School in Orlando Florida. he led the team in tackles his freshman year and finished fourth in that category as a sophomore PERIOD

 Gibson said PERIOD 

Joseph is one of  Big  players named to the Bednarik Award Watch List out of  players total in Division I PERIOD Four including Joseph are defensive backs Joseph is joined by Kansas State safety Dante Barnett TCU safety Derrick Kindred and Oklahoma cornerback Zack Sanchez PERIOD

The rest of the group contains last years winner Arizona linebacker Scooby Wright and six of last years semifinalists PERIOD

Since the award was first handed out in  its gone to a Big  player three times Texas AMs Dat Nguyen in  Oklahomas Teddy Lehman in  and Nebraskas Ndamukong Suh in  PERIOD

The Bednarik Award Watch List was announced sidebyside with the Maxwell Award Watch List its offensive counterpart PERIOD Although nine Big  players were selected to the Maxwell Award Watch List including Oklahoma State and TCU quarterbacks Mason Rudolph and Trevone Boykin no Mountaineers made the latter list PERIOD

The list will be pared down to a group of  semifinalists in early November and the three finalists will be announced on November  PERIOD The winner of the Bednarik Award will be announced as part of the College Football Awards show on December  PERIOD

The West Virginia Mountaineers football team is set to open their season on September  when they meet the Georgia Southern Eagles at Milan Puskar Stadium PERIOD
